ing: 3 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix
des: "Can't decide between sweet or sour? This rum squeeze might be the answer. It is a slurpy cocktail with a kick, a perfect complement to any sunset."
ins: Pour the rum, sweet and sour mix, lime juice, and coconut syrup into the pitcher of a blender; drop in the ice cubes and blend to a slushy consistency. Pour into a glass to serve.
